parts.text: {"word":"vaciarse","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"空になる、空っぽになる、中身がなくなる","english_definition":"to become empty; to be emptied; to run out (of contents)","examples":[{"sentence":"El vaso se vació rápidamente.","translation":"グラスはすぐに空になった。"},{"sentence":"La piscina se está vaciando para limpiarla.","translation":"プールは掃除のために空にされている。"},{"sentence":"Se vació de toda esperanza.","translation":"彼はあらゆる希望を失った（希望がなくなった）。"}],"collocations":["vaciarse de agua (水がなくなる)","vaciarse de gente (人がいなくなる)","vaciarse de esperanza (希望がなくなる)"],"synonyms":["desocuparse","agotarse","descargarse"],"antonyms":["llenarse","ocuparse"],"notes":"Reflexive verb. Used to describe something becoming empty on its own or being emptied."},{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(感情などを)吐き出す、打ち明ける、さらけ出す","english_definition":"to pour out one's feelings; to unburden oneself; to open up","examples":[{"sentence":"Necesitaba vaciarse con alguien sobre sus problemas.","translation":"彼は自分の問題を誰かに打ち明ける必要があった。"},{"sentence":"Se vació de toda su ira.","translation":"彼はすべての怒りをぶちまけた。"}],"collocations":["vaciarse con alguien (誰かに打ち明ける)","vaciarse de ira (怒りをぶちまける)","vaciarse de secretos (秘密を打ち明ける)"],"synonyms":["desahogarse","confesarse","descargarse"],"antonyms":["callarse","reprimirse"],"notes":"Reflexive verb. Used to describe expressing one's feelings openly."}],"etymology":{"value":"Derived from the verb 'vaciar' (to empty) with the reflexive pronoun 'se'. 'Vaciar' comes from the Latin 'vacuare' (to make empty), from 'vacuus' (empty).","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/baˈθjaɾse/ (Spain), /baˈsjaɾse/ (Latin America)","syllables":"va-ciar-se"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["me vacío","te vacías","se vacía","nos vaciamos","os vaciáis","se vacían"],"past_simple":["me vacié","te vaciaste","se vació","nos vaciamos","os vaciasteis","se vaciaron"],"future_simple":["me vaciaré","te vaciarás","se vaciará","nos vaciaremos","os vaciaréis","se vaciarán"],"present_subjunctive":["me vacíe","te vacíes","se vacíe","nos vaciemos","os vaciéis","se vacíen"],"past_subjunctive":["me vaciara/vaciase","te vaciaras/vaciases","se vaciara/vaciase","nos vaciáramos/vaciásemos","os vaciarais/vaciaseis","se vaciaran/vaciasen"],"imperative":{"formal_singular":"vacíese","plural":"vacíense","informal_singular":"vacíate","plural":"vaciáos"]}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Vaciarse' is a reflexive verb, meaning the action is performed on the subject itself. It can refer to the literal act of becoming empty or the figurative act of expressing one's feelings. The context determines the specific meaning.","priority":"N/A"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Yo vacío.","correct":"Yo me vacío.","note":"'Vaciarse' is a reflexive verb, so it requires the reflexive pronoun ('me', 'te', 'se', 'nos', 'os', 'se')."},{"incorrect":"Él está vaciado.","correct":"Él se está vaciando.","note":"The progressive form also requires the reflexive pronoun."}],"priority":"N/A"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["vaciar (to empty)","vacío (empty)","vaciado (emptied)"],"phrases":["vaciarse el alma (to pour out one's heart)"],"priority":"N/A"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"Moderate","priority":"N/A"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"The reflexive verb 'vaciarse' has two main meanings: becoming empty and expressing one's feelings. The first meaning is literal, referring to something losing its contents. The second meaning is figurative, referring to someone unburdening themselves by talking about their problems or feelings. The reflexive pronoun 'se' is essential for the correct usage of this verb."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Después de correr, la botella de agua se vació rápidamente.","translation":"After running, the water bottle emptied quickly.","type":"example","meaning_category":"Becoming empty"},{"sentence":"Necesitaba vaciarse con su mejor amigo sobre lo que le preocupaba.","translation":"He needed to open up to his best friend about what was worrying him.","type":"example","meaning_category":"Expressing feelings"},{"sentence":"El teatro se vació después de la función.","translation":"The theater emptied after the performance.","type":"example","meaning_category":"Becoming empty"},{"sentence":"Se vació de toda su tristeza al escribir en su diario.","translation":"She poured out all her sadness by writing in her diary.","type":"example","meaning_category":"Expressing feelings"}]}
